# ExtractArrayElement type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ExtractArrayElement<TArray extends Array<any>> = TArray extends [
  infer TElement,
  ...infer TRest,
]
  ? TRest extends []
    ? TElement
    : TArray
  : never;
```
